headline: ADP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: The board of directors of Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADP) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.54 per share payable July 1, 2025 to shareholders of record on June 13, 2025.
